items.sentence: I'm afraid I can't make a nine o'clock appointment.
I'd rather not take any medicine if I can avoid it.
I've heard that women spend more on shoes than men.
If you need anything, I hope you'll give me a call.
We hope that that happens sooner rather than later.
I hope that Tom hasn't been bothering you too much.
These questions are too difficult for me to answer.
I've already told you I'm not the one who did that.
Look around you. You're surrounded by good friends.
Things usually take longer than you expect them to.
